feed.title: Docker Volume Backup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.40.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Bump shoutrrr to version 0.8 #450

Fixes

  • Close file handler after encryption #419 (thanks @testwill)
  • Fix minor complaints raised by golangci-lint e613f6046fc09e2d76100f260a7481e4270d2486

Chores

  • Dependency hygiene #449 #448 #442 #444 #443 #441 #439 #440 #438 #435 #434 #431 #430 #428 #427 #426 #421 #418 #416 #415 #414 #408 #409 #410
  • Update Alpine to 3.20 #424
  • Dev setup maintenance

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.41.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Add support for Azure storage access tiers #452

Chores

  • Dependency hygiene #453 #454

entry.title: New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.42.0
New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.0
New release for Docker Volume Backup: v2.43.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Error cases when parsing labeled commands into argv are not handled sufficiently #506

Chores

  • Dependency hygiene #460 #461 #463 #464 #467 #469 #470 #475 #476 #477 #479 #482 #483 #485 #487 #489 #488 #491 #493 #494 #495 #499 #501 #500 #508 #510 #511 #512 #516 #518 #517
  • Compile using Go 1.23 #462
  • Base image off alpine:3.21 #502

Docs

  • Documentation update for DROPBOX_REMOTE_PATH environment variable #473 (thanks @shalafi99)
